content: To connect a third-party storage, you need to add the corresponding service in the Integration section of {{productName}} settings. Contact {{productName}} owner or administrator to enable the integration.

comment.text: This translation key is used to display a message when a third-party storage room's integration is not enabled. It prompts the user to contact the product owner/administrator to set up the integration in {{productName}} settings. This message appears in the CreateEditRoomDialog when no connected items are found.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "لتوصيل وحدة تخزين تابعة لجهة خارجية" (to connect a third-party storage unit) is a bit literal and could be more naturally phrased as "لربط مساحة تخزين خارجية" (to connect an external storage space). While technically correct, the original phrasing sounds somewhat stiff in Arabic.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: لربط مساحة تخزين خارجية

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "المسئول" (al-mas'ool) for administrator is correct but could be improved to “المدير” (al-mudeer) which is a more common and generally accepted term for 'administrator' in this context. It conveys a clearer sense of responsibility.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: المدير

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'Üçüncü' should probably be 'Xarici' or 'Zəruri' to better reflect 'Third-party'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Xarici tərəfin yaddaşına qoşulmaq üçün...

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'qoşulmaq' is a direct translation of 'connect', but in this context, it might be better to use a phrase that implies configuration or setup, rather than simply connecting.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Xarici tərəfin yaddaşı ilə işləmək üçün...

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The repeated use of {{productName}} is correct and necessary, but consider if it would be more natural to refer to the product by a more localized name where appropriate (though maintaining consistency is crucial).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: No direct suggestion, as this depends on the product's localization strategy.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'služby {{productName}}' appears twice. While technically correct, it's clunky. A better phrasing might imply the overall platform rather than the service itself.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Chcete-li připojit úložiště třetí strany, musíte přidat příslušnou službu v části Integrace v nastavení {{productName}}. Pro povolení integrace se obraťte na vlastníka nebo správce {{productName}}.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The second instance of '{{productName}}' is not preceded by a space after the period.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Chcete-li připojit úložiště třetí strany, musíte přidat příslušnou službu v části Integrace v nastavení {{productName}}. Pro povolení integrace se obraťte na vlastníka nebo správce {{productName}}.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Greek translation uses quotation marks (« ») that don't match the standard English quotation marks (").
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Replace « » with " "

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'Ingtegraatio' is a misspelling of 'Integroitio'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Integroitio

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Armenian translation lacks a period at the end of the sentence.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Երրորդ կողմի պահեստին միանալու համար դուք պետք է ավելացնեք համապատասխան ծառայությունը {{productName}}-ի կարգավորումների Ինտեգրման բաժնում։ Կապվեք {{productName}}-ի սեփականատիրոջ կամ ադմինիստրատորի հետ՝ ինտեգրումը միացնելու համար:

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Latvian translation lacks the double curly braces for the `productName` placeholder, which are present in the English content. This could cause rendering issues.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Change "{{productName}}" to "{{productName}}" to match the English formatting.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "această integrare" (this integration) feels slightly awkward in this context. A more natural phrasing would be "integrarea" (the integration).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Pentru a activa integrarea.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "තෙවන පාර්ශ්ව ආචයනයක් සම්බන්ධ කිරීමට" is a literal translation of 'To connect a third-party storage.' A more natural Sinhala phrasing would be something like 'තෙවන පාර්ශ්ව ගබඩාවක් සම්බන්ධ කිරීමට' (To connect a third-party storage).  'ආචයනය' refers to a method or technology, not a storage space.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: තෙවන පාර්ශ්ව ගබඩාවක් සම්බන්ධ කිරීමට

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "අනුකලනය කොටසට" is a somewhat clunky translation of 'in the Integration section.' A more natural phrasing would be something like 'අනුසంధານ කොටසට' or 'අනුකලන කොටසට'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: අනුසන්ධານ කොටසට

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'enable' can be translated as 'ප්‍රවර්ධනය කිරීමට' or 'සක්‍රීය කිරීමට'.  'සබල කිරීමට' is understandable, but not the most natural choice.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: සක්‍රීය කිරීමට

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Ak chcete pripojiť úložisko od tretej strany" is a literal translation of 'To connect a third-party storage'. A more natural Slovak phrasing would be something like 'Pre pripojenie úložiska tretej strany' or 'Na pripojenie úložiska tretej strany'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Pre pripojenie úložiska tretej strany

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term 'integráciu povoliť' is somewhat awkward. A more idiomatic phrasing would be 'zapnúť integráciu'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: zapnúť integráciu

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence structure is slightly clumsy. Combining the two sentences about contacting the owner/admin would improve flow.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ak chcete zapnúť integráciu, kontaktujte vlastníka alebo administrátora {{productName}}.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Serbian translation uses the possessive suffix '-а' after '{{productName}}' multiple times. This is grammatically correct but may sound slightly repetitive and less natural. While technically accurate, consider a phrasing that avoids the repetition.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider rephrasing to avoid the repetition of '-а' after '{{productName}}'. For example, 'у подешавањима {{productName}}' or 'у подешавањима овог производа'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation includes a hyphenated form of the product name "{{productName}}-a". While grammatically correct in Serbian, it might be more consistent to avoid the hyphenation if it isn't standard practice for product names in Serbian. Consider whether to use '{{productName}}' or '{{productName}}a' consistently throughout the application.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider using '{{productName}}a' instead of '{{productName}}-a' for consistency.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term "birimine bağlanmak" (to connect to a unit) is slightly awkward. A more natural phrasing would be "bir üçüncü taraf depolama hizmeti bağlamak" (to connect a third-party storage service).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Bir üçüncü taraf depolama hizmeti bağlamak için ilgili hizmeti...

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Turkish translation maintains the capitalization of 'Entegrasyon' which could be more consistent with Turkish conventions, potentially lowercasing it to 'entegrasyon'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Bir üçüncü taraf depolama hizmeti bağlamak için ilgili hizmeti {{productName}} ayarlarının entegrasyon bölümünde eklemeniz gerekir.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Щоб увімкнути інтеграцію" is a less direct translation of "to enable the integration." A more accurate and natural phrasing would be closer to 'Для ввімкнення інтеграції'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Для ввімкнення інтеграції, зверніться до власника чи адміністратора {{productName}}.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "bộ nhớ của bên thứ ba" (third-party storage) is somewhat literal and could be improved for natural flow in Vietnamese. A more natural phrasing might be "dịch vụ lưu trữ của bên thứ ba" or simply "dịch vụ lưu trữ bên ngoài".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Để kết nối dịch vụ lưu trữ của bên thứ ba, bạn cần thêm dịch vụ tương ứng trong phần Tích hợp của cài đặt {{productName}}.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'kích hoạt' (activate) might be too technical for the target audience. Consider a more accessible term like 'bật' (turn on) or 'thiết lập' (set up).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Liên hệ với chủ sở hữu hoặc quản trị viên {{productName}} để thiết lập tích hợp.
